import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './styles.css'; import { USERS } from './../../constants'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; class UserProfile extends Component { state = { userid: this.props.match?.params.id, }; render() { const uid = this.state.userid; return (

Profile Info

); } } export default UserProfile;
